high_descs: Turn left, go forward to the wall.
Take the candle from the corner of the tub rim.
Turn around, go forward to the door, turn left, go forward to the plunger on the floor.
Put the candle on the toilet tank's right side.
tasks.task_desc: Put a candle on a toilet tank.

high_descs: turn left to the tub
grab the candle by the tub
turn around, walk across the room to the toilet
put the candle on the toilet
tasks.task_desc: move the candle from the tub to the toilet

high_descs: turn left and walk towards the bathtub
pick up the candle from the tub
turn around and walk towards the door. make a left and walk forward to the toilet
place the candle on the toilet
tasks.task_desc: move the candle from the tub to the toilet

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bathtub.
Pick up the yellow towel on the right in the bathtub.
Turn around and walk to the sink.
Place the yellow towel in the sink, turn on the water for three seconds, then turn the water off and take the towel.
Turn around and walk across the room.
Put the yellow towel on the bottom shelf, to the left of the box of tissue.
tasks.task_desc: To wash the towel.

high_descs: move to the tub to the left of you
pick up a rag from the tub
move to the sink to the right
clean the rag in the sink
move to the shelf behind you
put the rag on the shelf
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned rag on the shelf.

high_descs: Turn around and take a step to your left.
Pick up the wash cloth that's to the right of the other one.
Turn around and take two steps then turn left and walk to the garbage that's to the left of the toilet.
Get the cloth wet in the sink.
Turn around and walk to the shelves.
Put the wet cloth to the left of the tissues on the bottom shelf.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet wash cloth on a shelf.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the center of the tub.
Pick up the yellow wash cloth to the right of another.
Turn around and walk so you are facing the garbage to the left of the toilet.
Put the wash cloth in the sink and get it wet.
Turn around and make your way to the shelf running along the wall on the floor.
Place the wash cloth to the left of the box of tissues.
tasks.task_desc: Place a wet wash cloth on a shelf in the bathroom.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bath tub.
Pick up the dirty rag on the right inside of the bath tub.
Turn around, then walk across the room and turn left towards the sink.
Rinse the dirty rag in the sink.
Pick up the rag, then turn around and walk towards the shelves.
Place the rag on the bottom shelf.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean rag on the bathroom shelf.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the tub.
Pick up the yellow rag on the right.
Turn right and walk to the sink.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Turn around and walk to the wall with the two shelves.
Place the yellow rag to the left of the tissue box on the bottom shelf.
tasks.task_desc: Put a washed rag on a shelf.

high_descs: Walk over to the shelf left of the bath tub
Pick up the yellow cloth from the shelf
Turn around and go to the sink
Wash the cloth in the sink and pick it up again
Turn around and walk back to the white shelf
Put the yellow cloth on the lower shelf left of the spray bottle
tasks.task_desc: Place the clean cloth on the lower shelf

high_descs: Walk forward and to the right to face the two shelves.
Pick the yellow rag up off the top shelf.
Turn around and veer left to the sink.
Wash the rag in the sink and pick it back up.
Turn around and go back to the wall with the two shelves.
Place the yellow rag to the left of the purple bottom on the bottom shelf.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean rag on a shelf.

high_descs: Turn to the right and then the left to face the top white shelf with the yellow cloth.
Pick the yellow towel up from the shelf.
Turn around and cross the room to face the sink.
Put the cloth in the sink and turn the water on and then off and then pick up the cloth from the sink.
Turn around and cross the room to face the white shelves.
Put the cloth on the bottom shelf to the left of the blue bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean cloth on a shelf.

high_descs: Turn right, head towards the tub, then turn left and go to the yellow rag on the white shelf.
Pick up the yellow rag on the shelf.
Turn around, bring the rag to the sink.
Wash the rag in the sink with water.
Take the cleaned rag back to the white shelf.
Put the cleaned rag on the bottom shelf next to the spray bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned rag on the bottom shelf.

high_descs: Walk forward and slightly to the right towards the yellow cloth by the wall.
Pick up the yellow cloth from the shelf.
Turn around and walk to the sink.
Put the cloth in the sink, rinse it off, and take it out of the sink.
Turn around and walk to the spray bottle on the shelf near the floor.
Put the cloth on that shelf, in front of and between the spray bottle and empty roll of toilet paper.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned yellow cloth on a shelf near the floor.

high_descs: Turn right, walk across the room, turn left and walk to the shelves.
Pick up the wash cloth on the shelf.
Turn around and walk towards the sink.
Place the wash cloth in the sink and turn on the water. Remove the wash cloth.
Turn around and walk to the shelves.
Place the wash cloth on the bottom shelf.
tasks.task_desc: Wet the wash cloth.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the white shelves on the wall to the left.
Pick up the far left box of tissues on the bottom shelf.
Turn left, hang a left at the door and walk to the toilet.
Put the box of tissues on the back side of the toilet tank in between the spray bottle and the empty roll of toilet paper.
tasks.task_desc: Place a box of tissues on a toilet tank.

high_descs: Turn around completely and turn right and face the white shelves
Pick up the tissue box from the shelf.
Turn to the left and then turn again to face the toilet.
Place the tissue box on the back end of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move the tissue box to the back end of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around and walk left to the shelves on the wall.
Pick up the leftmost tissue box on the bottom shelf.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Place the tissue box on the toilet behind the purple spray bottle.
tasks.task_desc: Place a tissue box on a toilet tank.

high_descs: Walk forward to the bathtub
Pick up the soap bar from the left side of the bathtub
Turn right and walk over to the sink
Wash the soap bar under the water in the sink and remove it
Turn around and walk over to the white wall shelf
Put the soap bar on the bottom shelf
tasks.task_desc: Put the rinsed soap bar on the bottom shelf

high_descs: Take a step forward to the bath tub.
Pick up the soap from the edge of the tub.
Hold the soap and turn around, then left to go to the sink.
Place the soap in the sink and turn on water. Turn off the water and pick up the soap.
Carry the soap and turn around to the shelf.
Place the soap on the bottom shelf by the floor.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse the soap and place on the shelf.

high_descs: Walk ahead to the bathtub.
Pick up the soap on the tub lip.
Turn right and walk to the sink.
Rinse the soap in the sink.
Turn around and walk to the shelves.
Place the soap on the bottom shelf to the right of the empty toilet paper roll.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed bar of soap on a shelf.

high_descs: Go to the right and face the right side of the sink.
Pick the soap up from the counter.
Put the soap in the sink and turn the water off and then on and pick the soap back up.
Turn to the left and face the tub.
Put the soap in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in a tub.

high_descs: Turn right and go to the sink
Pick up the bar of soap from the edge of the sink
Put the bar of soap in the sink and turn on the water, then turn off the water and pick up the bar of soap
Turn around, then turn right and go to the bath tub
Put the bar of soap in the bath tub
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean wet bar of soap in the bath tub

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the sink across the room.
Pick up the bar of soap on the front, right corner of the sink.
Place it in the sink, turn the water on and rinse the bar of soap, turn the water off, and remove the bar of soap from the sink.
Go to the bathtub on your left.
Place the bar of soap in the bathtub, between the two rags.
tasks.task_desc: Put a bar of soap in the bathtub.

high_descs: Turn and walk to the shelves on the left, and look up at the top shelf.
Pick up the tissue box to the right of the rag.
Walk over to the toilet and face the back of the toilet.
Put the tissue box down behind the spray bottle on the back of the toilet.

Loop up high and grab the box of tissues that are up there.

Put the box of tissues above the purple spray bottle on it's end so it's sitting behind the bottle vertically..
tasks.task_desc: Put a box of tissues on the toilet.

pick up tissue box from top shelf
turn around, go to right side of toilet

high_descs: Turn right and take a step then turn left and walk to the tub.
Pick up the pink bar of soap that's in front of you.
Turn right then take two steps to your right so you face the left side of the sink then take a step towards it..
Get the bar of soap wet in the sink and then pick it back up and shut off the water.
Walk back to where you got the soap.
Put the bar of soap in the middle of the tub just above the side of it so it's in the tub proper near the middle.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet bar of soap in the tub.

high_descs: Move to the right and face the tub.
Pick the soap up from the tub.
Turn around and turn to the left to face the right side of the sink.
Put the soap in the sink and turn the water on and then off and pick the soap up again.
Turn to the left to face the tub.
Put the soap in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in the tub.

high_descs: Turn to the right and take one step, then turn to the left and walk to the bathtub.
Pick up the pink soap that is in the bathtub.
Turn around and take two steps, then turn left and walk to the sink.
Put the soap in the sink, then turn on the faucet for three seconds, then turn the water off and pick up the soap.
Turn around and take one step, then turn right and walk across the room.
Put the soap down in the bathtub.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the white shelf on your left.
Pick up the left tissue box on the top shelf.
Turn around and walk over the the toilet that is in front of you.
Place tissue box on top of the back of the toilet

Pick up the left tissue box that is on the top shelf.
Turn back around and walk to the toilet that is in front of you.
Place tissue box on top of the back of the toilet, on its side

Turn left, go to wall, turn left, go to the toilet.
Put the bottle on the toilet.

high_descs: Move to the shelf to the left of the tub on the right hand side.

Move to the toilet behind you on the right side.
Place the bottle on the back of the toilet.

Pick up the purple bottle from the shelf.

Put the bottle on the back of the toilet.

Place the spray bottle between the soap dispenser and the bar of soap on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn to your right and walk towards the shelves and look up at the purple bottle.
Take the spray bottle on the shelf.
Bring it down and turn left and go towards the door. Turn left and walk towards the plunger and raise the bottle up.
Place the purple bottle on the back of the toilet.
tasks.task_desc: Move the purple spray bottle from the shelf to the back of the toilet.

pick up the purple spray bottle on the top shelf
look back down turn left and walk to the toilet
place the purple spray bottle on to the reservoir of the toilet

take the purple spray bottle from the top shelf

high_descs: Walk forward to the tub.
Pick up the yellow washcloth in the tub.
Turn around and walk to the right side of the sink on your left and face the garbage to the left of the toilet.
Get the wash cloth wet in the sink and pick it back up and close the tap.
Go back to where you got the yellow cloth.
Put the yellow cloth back where you got it.
tasks.task_desc: Put a wet washcloth in the tub.

high_descs: Walk across the room to the bath tub.
Pick up the yellow rag in the center of the bath tub.
Turn around and go to the sink on your left.
Place the yellow rag in the sink, turn the water on, rinse the rag out, turn the water off, and remove the rag.
Turn around and walk back to the bath tub to your right.
Put the yellow rag back in the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean, yellow rag in the bath tub.

high_descs: Walk to the tub.
Take the washcloth out of the tub.
Turn right and go to the sink.
Put the washcloth in the sink, wash it and pick it back up.
Go back to the tub.
Put the washcloth back in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse the washcloth in the sink and put it back in the tub.

Pull out the bar of soap from the garbage can.
Place the bar of soap in the sink, turn the water on, rinse off the bar of soap, turn the water off, and remove the bar of soap from the sink.
Turn to your left and go to the bathtub across from you.
Place the bar of soap to the left of the three rags, in the bathtub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean bar of soap in the bathtub.

high_descs: Turn left and walk up to the trash bin right of the bathroom sink

Wash the soap bar in the sink and remove it
Turn left and walk up to the side of the bathtub
Put the soap bar in the bathtub
tasks.task_desc: Put the cleaned soap bar in the bathtub

high_descs: Walk to the edge of the kitchen sink on your left.

Put the soap bar under the faucet, wash it, then grab it.
Walk to the tub on your left.
Place the soap bar in the tub.

high_descs: Turn left and walk over to the bath mat. Then turn right and face the bath tub.
Pick up the yellow rag from the bath tub.
Turn around and walk towards the toilet, then turn left and move towards the sink.
Drop the rag in the sink and wash it off with water.
Turn around and walk to the bench on floor against the wall on the other side of the room.
Put the rag on the bench next to the candle.

Pick up the yellow rag.
Turn around and walk to the sink on the left.
Wash the rag in the sink and pick it back up.
Turn around and walk to the wall with two shelves.
Place the rag on the bottom shelf to the left of the candle.

high_descs: Move slightly to the left and stand in front of the bath tub.
Pick up the yellow cloth from the bath tub basin.
Turn right and walk to the sink.
Put the cloth in the sink, rinse it off, and take it out of the sink.
Turn around and walk forward to the shelf close to the floor containing the candle.
Put the cloth on the shelf, to the left of the candle.

high_descs: Turn left and take one step, then turn right to face the bathtub.
Pick up the yellow cloth in the middle of the bathtub.

Place the yellow cloth in the sink, turn on the water for two seconds, then turn the water off and pick up the yellow cloth.
Turn left and take one step, then turn left and walk across the room.
Place the yellow cloth on the middle of the bottom shelf.

Pick up the yellow cloth from the tub

Wash the yellow cloth under water in the sink then remove it
Turn around and walk up to the white shelves against the wall
Put the cloth down on the bottom shelf

high_descs: Turn left and move to the center of the tub.
Pick up the yellow wash cloth in the tub.
Turn around and face the waste paper basket between the sink and the tub.
Put the wash cloth in the sink and get it wet.

Put the wash cloth to the left of the white and orange object.

Pick up the bottle from the trash can.
Turn around and walk to the shelves on the opposite wall.
Set the bottle down in between the two boxes of tissue.

Walk to the area between the wall and the toilet and place the spray can on the back of the toilet to the right of the yellow rag as you are facing the toilet.

pick up the spray bottle that is in the trash can
turn to the right, go past toilet, turn left, face the  wall

Put the second box of toilets on the toilet as well.

high_descs: Move over to the bathtub and face it so that you're looking down just to the left of where the shower curtain is.
Pick up the soap bar that's on the edge of the tub.
Take a step to the left with the soap bar.
Put the soap bar in the tub so that it's to the left of the yellow wash cloth.
Go to your left and face the shelves.
Pick up the soap bar that's on the top shelf to the right of the spray bottle.
Bring the soap bar back over to the bathtub.
Put the second bar of soap in the tub so that it's between the first and the yellow wash cloth.
